Avoid Reading, Seeing, and Hearing Impurity. --Those who would not fall a prey to Satan's devices must guard well the avenues of the soul; they must avoid reading, seeing, or hearing that which will suggest impure thoughts. The mind must not be left to dwell at random upon every subject that the enemy of souls may suggest. The heart must be faithfully sentineled, or evils without 


                                                 229 

will awaken evils within, and the soul will wander in  darkness.--AA 518 (1911).
